profile:
Elite Appliance has been servicing home owners, appliance manufacturers and property management firms in Ontario for over 21 years. A combination of expertise, passion and a sense for great customer care has led the company to grow from its initial 2 employees to well over 50 while expanding from our original location in Toronto to a second location in Oakville, a third in Ottawa and now our fourth location in London Ontario. Elite Appliance has rapidly become the #1 appliance repair service in the Ontario, earning itself multiple awards for excellence in service from multiple appliance manufacturers.

All our Technicians are all Factory trained and certified by all major appliance manufacturers to perform warranty and COD repairs, when choosing an appliance servicer, protect your valuable appliances and ensure the company you hire is authorized and trained by the manufacturer of your appliance. Working closely with appliance manufacturers we have become the Largest independent Servicer in Ontario and the Choice of Consumers when it comes to Appliance Repair. We have quickly built an outstanding reputation for our professionalism and honesty. Our mandate has always been the same: to deliver ELITE services at competitive prices, promptly and to our customers complete satisfaction.

profile:
We are committed to providing an excellent service across Toronto, GTA and nearby regions. In our decade of experience, we have learned that you can get your appliance, HVAC, electrical and plumbing issues repaired quickly, effectively, and relatively inexpensively. Our specialty is to provide quick solutions to all your appliance, plumbing, HVAC and electrical repairs and to achieve the highest possible customer satisfaction from our services. Our punctual and friendly staff will always provide budget-friendly repairs.

WHY DO OUR CUSTOMERS LOVE US?
"Slow is smooth, smooth is fast." This is our motto because we take exceptional care in locating your appliance and plumbing faults to have them fixed within the shortest possible period. We encourage our customers to watch us as we perform the repair and to ask as many questions as possible while we are on site. This will ensure the best service on the market because you will be educated on all of your appliances at no extra cost.
Man With a Wrench always provides an above and beyond service because we do not simply tackle the problem at hand. We also find its underlying cause. Most importantly, we provide our customers with education as to how to prevent such problems from occurring in the future. Our budget-friendly repairs are second to none and we will provide you with quick solutions to all of your appliance repair needs. Our goal is to delight you with our service. If you don’t go shouting from the rooftops how happy you are with your service following a work order, we will be very disappointed, for our business runs on word-of-mouth referrals and we strive to ensure you’re happy enough to tell your friends about our service

WHAT APPLIANCE REPAIR SERVICES DO WE OFFER?
We will repair any major appliance and any major brand for: 
- Refrigerators repair 
- Stove repair 
- Oven repair 
- Washing Machine repair 
- Dryer repair 
- Dishwasher repair 
- Microwave repair

We repair all makes and models, we even repair Miele appliances! Other brands we service regularly: Frigidaire, Simmons, Samsung, LG, GE, Kenmore, Thermadore, Whirlpool, Kenmore, Maytag, Moffat, Dacor, Fisher and Paykel, Thermador, Electrolux, Bosch, Sub Zero, Amana, Jenn-Air, Wolf, AEG, Magic Chef, Viking, Blomberg, Admiral, Westing House, Ariston, MagicChef, Inglis - IF THE Brand is not on the list WE CAN DO IT (we just missed it).

WHAT PLUMBING SERVICES DO WE OFFER?
- Toilet repair 
- Drain cleaning
- Plumbing repairs
- New installations (sinks, toilets, showers) 
- Water pumps
- Water heaters
- Frozen pipes
- Re-piping
- Burst Pipes
- Leak Detection 
- Inspections

We service Toronto and all surrounding areas. That includes: Toronto, Whitby, Oshawa, Pickering, Scarborough, Markham, Aurora, Newmarket, Brampton, Bradford, Oakville, Mississauga, Etobicoke, North York, East York, GTA, Burlington, Barrie, Innisfil and all of the cities that surround the cities listed


We look forward to servicing your appliance and plumbing HVAC and electrical repair needs!

*** PROUDLY SERVICING: SUBZERO, WOLF, ASKO, SIRIUS BRAND APPLIANCES ONLY ***

1968 Kampen Appliance Service has been a family owned business and truly treat our customers honestly and fairly. Kampen Appliance Service has been dedicated to servicing Sub Zero and Wolf products for over 30 years and was recognized for that high level of service by being chosen as a Premier Factory Certified Service Centre.

We have the honour of being the only Premier Factory Certified Service Centre in the Greater Toronto and Hamilton Area (GTHA) and have a very close working relationship with the Sub Zero and Wolf factories. We must meet strict service requirements to maintain the "certified" designation.

profile:
Pegasus Appliance Repair is a locally owned Hamilton area appliance repair company that’s here to help you when you need us most.

Our number one objective is getting your appliances fixed as quickly and as affordably as possible so that you can go back to living your life.

We are here to help throughout the COVID-19 health crisis. 
Pegasus Appliance Repair remains available for service calls across the 7 days a week across the Greater Hamilton region.
Your safety is our top priority, so we continue to follow provincial health guidelines. 
When we arrive at your home, we'll practice physical distancing, wash our hands on arrival, and disinfect any surfaces we touch. 
We wish everyone nothing but the best health.

profile:
Complete Appliance Service in Hamilton

RTC Appliances offers in-home service and repairs to most major appliances; including refrigerators, stoves, dishwashers, microwaves, washers, dryers, and more. We want to ensure that your appliances are back up and running in a prompt and efficient manner.

We carry a large inventory of parts in our store for all the do-it-yourselfers.


A Dedication to Our Customers

Since 1976, it has been our privilege to service the individual homeowner, property manager, company, and manufacturer, in Hamilton and surrounding areas. Our team of skilled and experienced appliance experts can assist you with whatever you need: from on-site appliance repairs to locating the right part to fix the problem. RTC Appliances are always available to assist and provide you with the right service required.

profile:
Welcome to GTA Appliance Repair! My name is Dmitriy; I am the owner and operator of GTA  Appliance Repair. I have a total of 8 years of experience in the appliance service industry, 2 years as a factory trained and authorized technician on virtually all major brands, EPA certified for sealed system repairs on refrigeration and air conditioning. I have 4 years’ experience as a manager, which has allowed me to see the customers’ needs from different perspectives.

As owner I operate the business as I always believed it should be done – provide customer service first, through integrity, sincerity and respect, never putting the importance of profits before good customer service and a great reputation. “Integrity is the essence of everything successful.”

I look forward to serving your appliance repair needs. We are located in Toronto, family owned and operated, and offer “Personalized Service You Can Trust”. We service the Toronto GTA area.

Our goal at GTA Appliance Repair is to provide our customers with the assurance of knowing there is someone they can trust to come to their aid whenever their appliance fails or just needs maintenance. As our name implies, we want to be our customer’s honest and reliable appliance repair source and we want to take the worry out of appliance repair.

For our customers comfort and safety, we can email a picture of the technician that is coming to your home. Our vans will be clearly marked with full van graphics as in our photos and our technicians will be wearing uniforms with their name and the GTA  Appliance Repair logo embroidered on them.

Out of respect for each customer and their home, the technician will wear shoe covers to protect the floors from dirt and damage, use a tool matt to protect floors and counter tops, and utilize floor guards when moving an appliance for repairs. The appliance and work area will be cleaned before leaving the customer’s home.

Our customers can relax knowing that their technician is a well trained professional, insured, and EPA certified. Our vans will be fully stocked with original factory replacement parts as well as all the tools and equipment necessary to get the job done right the first time whenever possible. We aim to minimize our customer’s valuable time invested in getting the repair completed.
services:
Refrigerator Repair

​

Free standing and built-in refrigerators break down for a different reasons and show variety signs of problems. For example, stop producing any coolant or start making loud noises, Ice maker don’t producing any ice. Some issues might be never have place if on time to do the Maintenance, one or twice a year – ask one of our technician what kind of maintenance you can perform your self . The other issues can be minor or major breakdowns, so its important to diagnose and repair your Appliance as soon is possible. You can Call and speak with one of GTA Appliance Repair  Technician to get proper diagnosis and your appliance fixed. 

​

Top or Frond Loader Washer Repair & Dryer Repair

​

There’s nothing worse then came back from vacation and in the middle of washing cycle washer/ washing  machine or dryer stop working. Regardless of the type or brand and model of your washing machine or Dryer, gas or electric, our experienced technician are trained to diagnose and perform Washer Repair Service and Dryer Repair Service as soon as you Call.

​

Wall Oven and Stove/Range Repair

​

Range/Oven are constantly functioning in high heat, oil and cooking spills. That’s often cause of the breakdown in Range, Oven or top burner. Wary important to diagnose the problem and in short time perform proper Oven Repair. Electric burner coils or terminal block can burn out, control board and display stop working and indicate fault error message, top gas bearer stop igniting and keep sparking with out turning knob. Call our Certified Appliance Repair Expert who will in safe and proper manor will guide you Stove Repair expertise until your appliance is fully fixed.

​

Dishwasher Repair

​

Most issue in your Dishwasher can be repaired by just cleaning drain screen or drain hoses. More repairs in dishwasher, such as faulty drain pump, wash motor, soup dispenser need the skill and knowledge of a qualified technician. Consider calling to GTA Appliance Repair for professional service.
specialities:
Trusted, Same-day Appliance Repair 
Let experienced appliance repair technicians take care of your appliance repair needs fast and on budget!

GTA Appliance Repair  provides reliable appliance repair services in Toronto, Mississauga, Vaughan, Milton, Hamilton, Burlington and surrounding areas. Our experienced and professional technicians provide same-day service, throughout the year. In addition, our service warranty will ensure the quality of your repair and give you peace of mind for the future.

We are all dependent on home appliances to function properly, so when one of them breaks, its important to get a fix quickly.  That’s the reason why the same-day service provided by our trusty technicians, even on evenings, weekends and holidays, is so popular with our existing clients.

​

We now provide condo appliance repair services!
Our team of technicians are located throughout the Toronto GTA area, including

Downtown Toronto, Hamilton, Scarbough and Vaughan. All technicians’ vans are fully

stocked with new replacement parts of major appliance brands, so when they

arrive to your location, the repair can be performed smoothly in one visit.

On a rare occasion when parts are not available, the repairman will order the required

parts from our Local appliance parts supplier, which are typically delivered on the next day.
